item.title: 中国人工智能公司智璞在国家支持下融资 2.57 亿美元
item.description: 据中国国家媒体《新京报》周三报道，中国人工智能初创公司智璞人工智能（Zhipu AI）已从成都政府支持的基金获得了3亿元人民币（合4150万美元）的投资，这是中国城市支持国内人工智能发展的最新举措。【原文：Chinese AI startup Zhipu AI has secured 300 million yuan ($41.5 million) in investment from a Chengdu government-backed fund, state media, the Beijing News reported on Wednesday, in the latest move by Chinese cities to support domestic AI development.】

item.title: 西门子首席财务官称政治不确定性影响客户决策
item.description: 西门子首席财务官拉尔夫-托马斯（Ralf Thomas）周三表示，由于政治不确定性，西门子在美国的客户有些犹豫不决，但他预计这种情况不会持续太久。【原文：Siemens is seeing some hesitancy among customers in the United States due to political uncertainties, Chief Financial Officer Ralf Thomas said on Wednesday, although he does not expect the situation to last.】

item.title: 关税不确定性为并购反弹蒙上阴影，奥本海默下调高盛和杰富瑞评级
item.description: 美国券商奥本海默周三下调了高盛、杰富瑞金融和凯雷的评级，理由是唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的不确定性对交易构成威胁。【原文：U.S. brokerage Oppenheimer downgraded Goldman Sachs , Jefferies Financial and Carlyle on Wednesday, citing a threat to dealmaking from uncertainty over President Donald Trump's tariff policies.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚再次寻求美国豁免对石油公司 NIS 的制裁
item.description: 塞尔维亚国家天然气公司（Srbijagas）首席执行官周三表示，由俄罗斯天然气工业石油公司（Gazprom Neft）和俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）控股的塞尔维亚国家石油公司（NIS）已向美国提交了第二份豁免制裁的申请。【原文：Serbian oil company NIS , majority-owned by Russian Gazprom Neft and Gazprom , has submitted a second request to the U.S. for a waiver of sanctions, the CEO of state gas company Srbijagas said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 西班牙初创企业 Playtomic 在新一轮融资中估值 2.73 亿美元
item.description: 西班牙初创公司 Playtomic 通过手机应用租赁球拍运动场地，其首席执行官费利克斯-鲁伊斯（Felix Ruiz）周三表示，该公司在新一轮融资中获得了 2.5 亿欧元（2.73 亿美元）的估值。【原文：Spanish startup Playtomic, which rents racket sports courts through a mobile phone app, achieved a valuation of 250 million euros ($273 million) in a new funding round, its chief executive Felix Ruiz said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长库比切克对将比特币作为储备资产持 "怀疑态度
item.description: 捷克国家银行董事会成员扬-库比切克（Jan Kubicek）对将比特币纳入该银行的巨额储备持 "怀疑态度"，因为他担心法律上的不确定性以及数字货币的波动性。【原文：Czech National Bank board member Jan Kubicek is "sceptical" about the inclusion of bitcoin among the bank's hefty reserves, wary of legal uncertainties and concerns around volatility of the digital currency.】

item.title: 激进派 Starboard 在欧特克发起董事会争夺战
item.description: Starboard Value 公司周三在欧特克（Autodesk）发起了一场董事会争夺战，引发了人们对这家设计软件制造商利润率的担忧，并加剧了这家激进投资者为实现公司变革而进行的长期斗争。【原文：Starboard Value on Wednesday launched a boardroom battle at Autodesk , raising concerns over the design software maker's margins and intensifying the activist investor's prolonged struggle to effect changes at the company.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普加征关税，欧盟提议削减15%的钢铁进口量
item.description: 欧盟一位高级官员周三表示，欧盟将从4月起收紧钢铁进口配额，将进口量再减少15%，此举旨在防止廉价钢铁在华盛顿征收新关税后涌入欧洲市场。【原文：The European Union will tighten steel import quotas to reduce inflows by a further 15% from April, a senior EU official said on Wednesday, in a move aimed at preventing cheap steel flooding the European market after Washington imposed new tariffs.】

item.title: 安联、贝莱德和 T&D 联合收购 Cinven 持有的 Viridium 股份
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz）周三表示，由安联集团、贝莱德（BlackRock）和T&D控股公司组成的财团将投资维里迪马集团（Viridium Group），交易金额为35亿欧元（38.2亿美元），私募股权公司Cinven将作为多数投资者退出。【原文：A consortium that includes Allianz , BlackRock and T&D Holdings are investing in Viridium Group in a 3.5 billion euro ($3.82 billion) deal that will see the private equity company Cinven exit as a majority investor, Allianz said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标政策迷雾笼罩美联储
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 联合信贷银行首席执行官奥塞尔对欧洲银行并购前景 "不太乐观
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官安德烈亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）周三表示，与几个月前相比，他对欧洲银行业大规模整合的前景 "不太乐观"，因为银行老板们对执行交易所需的时间越来越紧张。【原文：UniCredit's CEO Andrea Orcel said on Wednesday he was "less optimistic" about the prospects for sizeable European banking consolidation than a few months ago because bank bosses were growing increasingly nervous about the time needed to execute deals.】

item.title: 德国监管机构为裕信银行-德国商业银行的首次点头设定了四月的最后期限
item.description: 德国反垄断机构发言人周三表示，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）收购德国商业银行（Commerzbank）大量股份的初步批准期限将于 4 月 14 日到期。【原文：A deadline for German antitrust authorities to give possible initial approval for Italy's UniCredit in taking a substantial stake in Germany's Commerzbank expires on April 14, a spokesperson for the regulator said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国结束为期两年的阿根廷家禽进口禁令
item.description: 在与美国针锋相对的贸易战导致美国对家禽征收高额关税之际，中国解除了对从阿根廷进口家禽的两年禁令，重新打开了一条重要的供应渠道。【原文：China has lifted a two-year ban on poultry imports from Argentina, reopening a key supply channel amid a tit-for-tat trade war with the United States that has led to steep tariffs on U.S poultry.】

item.title: 香港旨在通过新网络安全法保护关键设施
item.description: 香港周三通过了一项网络安全法，以监管关键基础设施的运营商，迫使他们加强计算机系统并报告网络安全事件，否则将面临最高 500 万港元（64 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Hong Kong passed a cybersecurity law on Wednesday to regulate operators of critical infrastructure, forcing them to strengthen computer systems and report cybersecurity incidents or risk penalties of up to HK$5 million ($640,000).】

item.title: UnitedHealth 旗下部门降低部分处方药的续保要求
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）旗下的药房福利管理公司 Optum Rx 周三表示，将放宽约 80 种药品的续订处方时获得保险授权的要求，旨在减少患者和医生的文书工作。【原文：UnitedHealth Group's pharmacy benefit manager, Optum Rx, said on Wednesday it would ease requirements to get insurance authorization when renewing prescriptions on about 80 drugs, aiming to reduce the paperwork for patients and doctors.】

item.title: 通用磨坊因需求低迷下调年度预期
item.description: 本周三，Pillsbury 的所有者通用磨坊公司（General Mills）预测全年销售额和利润将大幅下降，原因是在不确定的宏观环境下，生活成本仍然居高不下，来自廉价自有品牌的竞争加剧。【原文：Pillsbury owner General Mills forecast a sharp decline in annual sales and profit on Wednesday, hit by increased competition from cheaper private label brands amid still high cost of living in an uncertain macro environment.】

item.title: 罗氏因担心美国行政命令而放弃全球多元化目标
item.description: 瑞士制药商罗氏（Roche）放弃了建立更多元化员工队伍的全球目标，以避免受到最近美国行政命令的处罚。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Roche has abandoned global targets for a more diverse workforce to avoid penalties from recent U.S. executive orders, the latest in a slew of companies to do so.】

item.title: 亚马逊机器人出租车部门 Zoox 因意外制动问题召回 258 辆汽车
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的自动驾驶部门 Zoox 周三表示，由于其自动驾驶系统（ADS）存在可能导致意外急刹车的问题，该公司已召回 258 辆汽车。【原文：Amazon.com's self-driving unit, Zoox, has recalled 258 vehicles due to issues with its automated driving system (ADS) that could cause unexpected hard braking, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达、xAI 将与微软、贝莱德共同开发人工智能基础设施
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）、微软（Microsoft）和阿布扎比投资公司MGX周三表示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的xAI和人工智能芯片巨头英伟达（Nvidia）将加入一个开发人工智能基础设施的集团。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI and AI chip giant Nvidia will be part of a group to develop infrastructure for artificial intelligence, BlackRock , Microsoft and Abu Dhabi-backed investment company MGX said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，阿克塞尔-施普林格考虑出售营销业务 Awin
item.description: 据三位熟悉内情的人士透露，德国媒体集团阿克塞尔-施普林格（Axel Springer）正在考虑出售其联属营销部门 Awin。【原文：German media group Axel Springer is considering a sale of its affiliate marketing unit Awin, according to three people familiar with the matter, following the planned break-up its owners agreed last year.】

item.title: 投资者等待美联储决定，期货走高
item.description: 在人们广泛期待的美联储货币政策决定出台之前，美国股指期货周三有所上涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures gained some ground on Wednesday ahead of the Federal Reserve's widely anticipated monetary policy decision.】

item.title: 机构报告称富士康两年内服务器收入将超 iPhone
item.description: 据台湾 "中央社 "报道，全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司的主要 iPhone 制造商--台湾富士康公司预计，其服务器收入将在两年内超过 iPhone 收入。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's main iPhone maker, expects its server revenue to surpass its revenue from iPhones within two years, Taiwan’s Central News Agency reported.】

item.title: 投资者希望富国银行在 2025 年取消资产上限
item.description: 在富国银行成功结束 2025 年的五次监管行动后，投资者和分析师对今年取消富国银行的资产上限抱有更大的希望，这使其股票更具吸引力。【原文：Investors and analysts are more hopeful the asset cap on Wells Fargo will be lifted this year after the bank managed to close five regulatory actions in 2025, making its shares more attractive.】

item.title: 利率按兵不动，美联储的经济预测占据中心位置
item.description: 预计美联储将在周三维持利率稳定，政策制定者将发布新的经济预测，显示他们是否仍认为利率将在年底前走低，因为他们正在梳理特朗普政府头两个月的影响。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday, with new economic projections out from policymakers that will show if they still see rates moving lower by the end of the year as they sort through the implications of the first two months of the Trump administration.】

item.title: 大科技公司数据中心的蓬勃发展给美国电网运营商带来新风险
item.description: 数据中心小巷位于华盛顿特区外 30 平方英里处，是 200 多个数据中心的所在地，其耗电量与波士顿差不多。因此，去年夏天的一天，这些数据中心中的很大一部分（60 个）突然断电，转而使用现场发电机，这让电力公司的官员们大为震惊。【原文：Data Center Alley, a 30-square-mile stretch outside Washington D.C. and home to more than 200 data centers, consumes roughly the same electricity as Boston. So power company officials were alarmed when a big chunk of those centers - 60 of them - suddenly dropped off the grid one day last summer and switched to on-site generators.】

item.title: 美国政治边缘政策削弱了国债的避险地位
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策引发了市场动荡，投资者纷纷将美国国债作为避风港，但迫在眉睫的债务上限辩论和持续的政治边缘政策都严酷地提醒人们，即使是世界上最终的无风险资产也难免出现裂痕。【原文：Investors have been flocking to U.S. Treasuries as a safe haven due to market turmoil fueled by President Donald Trump’s trade policies, but a looming debt ceiling debate and ongoing political brinkmanship are stark reminders that even the world's ultimate risk-free asset is not immune to cracks.】

item.title: 贸易战迫在眉睫，特朗普将宴请美国顶级石油公司总裁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周三在白宫接待石油行业的高层管理人员，他将阐述在原油价格下跌和贸易战迫在眉睫的情况下促进国内能源生产的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will host top oil executives at the White House on Wednesday as he charts plans to boost domestic energy production in the midst of falling crude prices and looming trade wars.】

item.title: 贸易战迫在眉睫，特朗普将宴请美国顶级石油公司总裁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于周三在白宫接待石油行业的高层管理人员，他将阐述在原油价格下跌和贸易战迫在眉睫的情况下促进国内能源生产的计划。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will host top oil executives at the White House on Wednesday as he charts plans to boost domestic energy production in the midst of falling crude prices and looming trade wars.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官：仿人机器人革命比你想象的更近了
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）认为，仿人机器人距离在制造设施中广泛使用还有不到五年的时间。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang believes humanoid robots are less than five years away from seeing wide use in manufacturing facilities.】

item.title: 日本称经济正在复苏，但提示特朗普贸易政策带来的风险
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策可能会抑制全球经济增长，通胀率上升可能会损害消费者支出。【原文：Japan's government stuck with its cautiously optimistic outlook for the economy U.S. President Donald Trump's trade policies could dampen global growth and higher inflation could hurt consumer spending.】
